title.en: To You Who Never Loved Me

altTitles.en: To You Who Doesn't Love Me

altTitles.es: Para el que nunca me amó

altTitles.ja: 私を愛してくれないあなたへ

altTitles.th: ถึงท่านที่ไม่รักกัน

altTitles.id: To You Who Don't Love Me

description.de:
Rose ist ein junges Mädchen, das geopfert werden soll, um den Leviathan, eine riesige Seeschlange, zu besänftigen und ihr Dorf vor dem Untergang zu bewahren. Doch kurz bevor das schreckliche Monster sie verschlingt, taucht ein junger Mann namens Michael aus dem Nichts auf, um sie zu retten. Rose kann nicht anders, als sich unsterblich in ihn zu verlieben. Doch schließlich findet sie heraus, dass er nur ihre außergewöhnliche Fähigkeit ausnutzen wollte, Wunden zu heilen. Welche Wahl verbleibt ihr, wenn sie den Mann, der sie immer wieder verletzt, weder aufgeben noch töten kann?

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55905472), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5623568), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/297027577)

**Original Webtoon:** [Aladin](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=281760716), [BookCube](https://www.bookcube.com/toon/detail.asp?webtoon_num=210545), [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/1877), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57794745), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/who_dont_love_me), [MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/comic/C000049606), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6559977), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/297040486), [Yes24](http://www.yes24.com/product/goods/103648322)

description.en:
Ages ago in a land of myth and legend, a young girl called Rose stands tied to a stake, awaiting her cruel fate as a sacrifice to the sea serpent known as Leviathan. That is, until a dashing hero suddenly appears to defeat the monster and save Rose’s life. Eternally grateful, Rose becomes devoted to her rescuer Mikhail, who is the demigod son of the moon goddess, Diana. She joins his party of adventurers, but soon comes to realize that her savior may not be as noble as he seems...

---
It was a hero with dreams of unifying the continent that saved me, who was about to become an offering made to a monster. And inevitably, I fell in love with him. But, the sad truth is, every famed and mythical hero eventually ends up with a beautiful and noble princess. And I was just a girl he’d saved. So, when he finally did unify the continent and marry a princess like any other hero, I, who couldn’t bring myself to kill you, decided to leave forever.

“Goodbye, my moonlight.”

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55905472), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5623568), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/297027577)

description.es:
Él, un héroe con el sueño de unificar el continente. Yo, una simple chica que estaba a punto de convertirse en ofrenda para un gran monstruo. Como era de esperarse, él, el héroe, me salvó a mí. Y yo, inevitablemente, me enamoré de él. Pero la triste realidad es que un héroe famoso y mítico no termina con una chica como yo, sino con una bella y noble princesa. Y así fue: él unificó el continente y se casó con esa princesa. ¿Dónde quedo yo? Yo decidí irme porque no sé cuándo me amará. Espero que sea pronto.

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55905472), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5623568), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/297027577)

description.fr:
Rose est une jeune fille destinée à être sacrifiée pour calmer le Léviathan, un gigantesque serpent de mer. Devant le monstre affreux, elle s’apprête à mourir quand un jeune homme, Michaël, surgit de nulle part pour la sauver. Rose ne peut que tomber follement amoureuse de lui, mais finit par découvrir qu’il voulait seulement se servir de son pouvoir extraordinaire: celui de guérir des blessures. Que pourrait-elle faire quand elle ne peut ni abandonner, ni tuer l’homme qui ne cesse de la blesser?

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55905472), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5623568), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/297027577)

description.id:
Siapa sangka, di hari Rose ditumbalkan kepada Leviathan oleh warga desa, Rose malah diselamatkan oleh Mihael. Sejak saat itu, Rose menganggap Mihael adalah segalanya. Rose akan melakukan apa pun untuk Mihael karena Rose mencintainya. Tapi, apakah Mihael juga mencintainya? Atau hanya menginginkan Rose karena kekuatan yang dimilikinya...

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55905472), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5623568), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/297027577)

description.ko:
"미하엘. 넌 내게 신이었어."

마을 사람들에 의해 괴수의 제물로 바쳐진 소녀 로즈 몰리.
그녀는 죽음 직전 떠돌이 용사 미하엘에게 목숨을 건진다.
미하엘은 로즈의 특별한 힘을 눈치채고 그녀를 거둬들이고
로즈의 세계는 미하엘을 중심으로 돌아가게 된다. 
미하엘은 그녀가 상처 입는 것을 알면서도 그녀를 도구로만 이용한다.

"혼자서 가버리는 건 이제 안 돼, 로즈.
고통이든 안식이든, 뭐든 나와 함께해."

처절하게 후회하게 될 줄은 꿈에도 모른 채.

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55905472), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5623568), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/297027577)

description.th:
โรส มอลลี่ เด็กสาวที่ถูกชาวบ้านใช้เป็นเครื่องบูชายัญสัตว์ประหลาดได้รับการช่วยเหลือจากมิฮาเอล นักรบเร่ร่อน และนั่นเป็นจุดเริ่มต้นที่ทำให้โรสหลงรักมิฮาเคลหัวปักหัวปำ คอยติดตามเขาอยู่เสมอ มิฮาเอลกล่าวว่าเขาเป็นห่วงและต้องการดูแลเธอ แต่ก็น่าสงสัยว่า หรือที่จริงแล้ว เขาเก็บเธอไว้ข้างกายเพียงเพื่อจะใช้ประโยชน์จากพลังพิเศษของโรสกันแน่...

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55905472), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5623568), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/297027577)

description.zh:
把成为祭品的我拯救出来的人，是有着统一整个大陆梦想的英雄。我爱上他，是一场必然。但令人凄然的是在所有神话中，英雄总会在故事的结尾爱上美丽又高贵的公主。而我，只不过是他在路上见到的可怜少女罢了..无法干掉你的我,最终选择永远离开你。“再见，我的白月光。"

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55905472), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5623568), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/297027577)

description.zh-hk:
某個沿海村莊為了使海裡的怪獸平靜，將進行一年一次的活人獻祭，擁有特殊能力的少女蘿絲被選為祭品，而命在旦夕之際，一名俊美的冒險家米哈爾拯救了她。後來，米哈爾發現了蘿絲的特殊能力，表面上親近她，但實際卻只是在利用蘿絲，失去雙親的蘿絲將米哈爾視為世界的中心，情不自禁地愛上了他......

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55905472), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5623568), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/297027577)

**Original Webtoon:** [Aladin](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=281760716), [BookCube](https://www.bookcube.com/toon/detail.asp?webtoon_num=210545), [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/1877), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57794745), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/who_dont_love_me), [MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/comic/C000049606), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6559977), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/297040486), [Yes24](http://www.yes24.com/product/goods/103648322)
